title: Stick

properties.name: description
properties.value: Stick is a troll that is encountered on Death Plateau. Players wishing to fight him should be careful, as he has a lot of hitpoints and can hit a max of 27. Since he only attacks with melee, the Protect from Melee prayer would be useful. Like the rest of the "big, bad" trolls in the area, such as Rock, Pee Hat, and Kraka, he may drop a Rune warhammer or Granite shield.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Stick
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Monster ID926

Stick is a troll that is encountered on Death Plateau. Players wishing to fight him should be careful, as he has a lot of hitpoints and can hit a max of 27. Since he only attacks with melee, the Protect from Melee prayer would be useful. Like the rest of the "big, bad" trolls in the area, such as Rock, Pee Hat, and Kraka, he may drop a Rune warhammer or Granite shield.

He as well as Rock can be safespotted with ranged to the south-west of his spawn location.

Trolls are named after the first thing they eat, so he probably ate a stick.
